title: WTB: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug low grade
author: btryin

posts.post_title: WTB: N300 Mayo's Cut Plug low grade
posts.post_content:
Want to add one from this issue to my collection. Looking for a low grade example (A, 1, 2). Prefer one with very little back damage as the black back is part of what makes this issue unique and appealing to me.

If you have one for sale, please PM me. Thanks!
110 delivered....back is clean. I guess someone might have touched up a tiny patch of white on the back, for the AUT...but not positive.,.,.,
I'll take it Leon. PM'd you. Thanks!
Thanks guys. And thanks to Leon for the great Christmas deal. I couldn't be happier to add this one to my collection!

[quote name="btryin" post=1614368]Thanks guys. And thanks to Leon for the great Christmas deal. I couldn't be happier to add this one to my collection![/QUOTE]

I put it in the mail box yesterday but mail didn't run. And the thanks goes to you for the sale. Sometimes squeezing every penny out of a deal isn't the best. I think good deals begat good deals. :)  I have seen a ton of collectors paying it forward on our board. The hobby should be a friendly place.
